Killing has to be stop by any means.
No human being born to be killed by other human.
Stop war, start living enjoying  life, is no`t ours war to be die early, family of people who did die for nothing don`t deserving that they growing child and later when he  grow up join army, and die.
This is no`t about just stop war, this is about to come down, and start love each other as a human to build happy future.
